meanings.definition: Maintaining a constant body temperature regardless of external conditions.
meanings.sent1: The homoiothermic lizard basked in the sun to keep its body temperature steady.
meanings.sent2: The polar bear is homoiothermic, meaning it can stay warm even in freezing temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The homoiothermic penguin decided to wear a tiny sweater just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her consistent kindness was like a homoiothermic flame, warming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The homoiothermic engine ran smoothly, never overheating even on the hottest days.

meanings.definition: An organism that regulates its body temperature to remain constant.
meanings.sent1: The homoiothermic bird adjusted its feathers to stay warm in the cold.
meanings.sent2: The mammal is a homoiothermic creature, always keeping its body temperature stable.
meanings.sent3: The homoiothermic fish wore a tiny thermometer necklace just for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's performance was homoiothermic, always consistent and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The homoiothermic reptile was like a living thermometer, always at the perfect temperature.
